abstract: The reading list from our winter women's fashion issue: "Chicks With Guns," by Lindsay McCrum, "Adam and Evelyn," by Ingo Schulze and "White Truffles in Winter," by N. M. Kelby.
snippet: The reading list from our winter women's fashion issue: "Chicks With Guns," by Lindsay McCrum, "Adam and Evelyn," by Ingo Schulze and "White Truffles in Winter," by N. M. Kelby.
lead_paragraph: In Ingo Schulze's cheery novel "Adam and Evelyn" (Knopf, $28), a lecherous East German dressmaker gets a bit too cozy with his comrade clientele, inciting his girlfriend to go on a sex-charged romp through newly democratic Hungary.
